data.text:
SUMMARY

Seeking new full time career opportunities that will utilize my knowledge and experience acquired at start ups thru enterprise SW, HW, and Service companies.

Career in Managing, Planning, Designing, Developing, Testing, Delivering, Quality SW, HW, and Service Products for Worldwide Customers and major industry leaders.

Customer management awards, acknowledgments from industry organizations, extensive levels of Customer Interaction, won reference accounts, managed key relationships, provided direction of new emerging technology.

Development Customer Advocate ("voice of the customer") for Premier Worldwide Enterprise Customers such as Dell, IBM, Oracle, Bank of America, Fireman's Fund, Royal Bank of Canada, Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce, Blue Cross Blue Shield, Sears, and many more.

New emerging quality enterprise SW, HW, and Service Products with special attention to continuous product improvements by collaborating with researchers, architects, developers, users, and customer’s environments.

SW, HW, QA, Automated & Manual Testing, VMWare, Lab Setup and Support, Networks, User Acceptance

Servers (Dell, IBM, Sun, e-Servers, i/pSeries, Power Edge, OptiPlex, Equal Logical, Power Vault, Blades, RISC, PPC, Intel, prototypes).

Clients (desktops, mobiles, embedded devices), Operating Systems, e-business N-Tier product solutions.

Consultant for leading edge Enterprise, Federal, DOD, and Research organizations.

Management, Team Building, and Leadership of Time Critical SW HW Product Development Life Cycles

New / Sustaining SW HW Product Development Life Cycle, SW HW QA, Testing, Project Office, Service, Support

Managing related teams, processes, and organizations using ISO, Agile, SEI, DOD, CMMI, and other Practices.

Product/Project Management, Business Analyst, Requirements Gathering, Definition, Design, Delivery, Quality Assurance, Test, Marketing, Pre/Post Sales Customer Support, Training, and Skills Transfer acquired in the development and use of leading edge computer product technologies in small to large scale application environments used by worldwide customers

Respected Mentor, Manager, Technical Leader, Developer, QA/Tester, and ''Go to person'' for onshore and offshore personnel

SW Inventor/Author issued 2 World Wide Patents, Articles to Technical Journals, many ''How to'' White Papers, Articles, System Support Manuals, User Manuals, System, Component, Test and Design Documentations

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Confidential

SW Engineer QA/SW/HW Consultant

Responsibilities:

Looking for right opportunity and volunteering using my skills at community and nonprofits organizations

Providing software and web application development, technical support, software testing, and software project management services.

Perform end-to-end functional, regression, and performance testing on web & back end systems

Worked with McAfee US and India development laboratories to identify and test solutions for problems found

Confidential, Austin, TX

Senior SW Engineer QA/SW/HW Consultant

Responsibilities:

Specializing in Quality Assurance for Power Firmware HW SW Products for High End to Entry Servers at IBM Systems & Technology Group

Assigned to new leading positions in an Agile Worldwide Development Environment

Delivered high quality SW, HW, and Service Products on time and under budget on brief delivery cycles

Power Firmware Development Team which developed “IBM WATSON COMPUTER”, other High End, Mid-Range, and future Servers

Developed test plans, build, component, functional, system, service, operating systems, and Firmware Management validation

Automated tests, Internal test framework, GUI driven test cases, VMWare, Rational Functional Test, and Rational Quality Manager

Python, Perl, Java Script, Bash, Kornshell, and XML to automate internal test procedures

Assisted Focus Product Release Group, Trained World Wide Field Engineers and Internship Groups

Confidential, Round Rock, TX

Senior SW Engineer QA/SW/HW Consultant

Responsibilities:

Completed early contract Validating Dell's Cloud Computing Solutions for the Dell’s Enterprise Product Group

Installed, Configured, Validated and made operational the new Enterprise NAS System Test Lab for 2010 Test Cycles

HW (Power Edge, Equal Logical, Power Vault, and NAS Servers), SW (Red Hat Enterprise Linux, Windows Servers/Storage Servers 2008, NAS Solutions, and client SW (NAS, Linux, Windows Vista, Windows 7), and managed lab space

Confidential

Senior SW Engineer QA

Responsibilities:

Dell Upper Management accolades for bring together an existing Agile development team with leadership and overall system view

Delivered major SW HW product suites ahead of schedule, under budget, and high quality rivaling other OEMs

Skills transfer from development to QA teams; planned, designed, reviewed, improved, and approved quality assurance processes

Manual/automated test environment; assigned, instructed, and helped QA teams with their test cycles when manpower was reduced

Enterprise Product Group Client/Server System Change Management Development Teams, enabling Dell Update Package Management for Customers and Major Dell Partners by providing seamless integration SW, HW, BIOS, Firmware, and Multi-Tier Apps Updates to all new/sustaining SW/HW Line Of Business Products on Windows, LINUX, UNIX;

Using internal Dell Development Platform, C/C++, Python, Script, Bash, XML, MMC, QTP, and others

Confidential, Austin, TX

Senior SW Java Engineer QA/SW/HW Consultant

Responsibilities:

Oracle Retail Products Division QA 360 Commerce POS Project Lead, Corporate Management acclaims for job well done.

QA lead role after their QA lead employee left without notice after I came on board.

Proceeded to deliver two major SW product suites (8.0/10.0 releases) of all the POS products coordinating offshore developers and testers

Managed, installed, configured, and tuned Development and Test Lab SW HW resources

Oracle Point of Sales (POS) N-Tier Web Products Releases 8.0 and 12.0 for Cash Registers (ORPOS) Product, Mobile POS (ORMPOS) Product, Store Servers (ORPOSS) Product, Back Offices (ORBO) Product, and Corporate Offices (ORCO) Product.

Products developed to run on VMWare, MS, Oracle, and WebSphere Applications Servers; MS, Oracle, and DB2 Database Servers;

UNIX, AIX, LINUX, and MS Platforms using Development Java Platform, C/C++, Python, Script, Bash, XML, QTP, and others

Confidential, Austin, TX

Senior SW Java Engineer QA/SW/HW Consultant

Responsibilities:

Delivery of major IBM SW and HW Products releases. Mentored and Managed SW Developers, Contractors, and Interns.

Managed installed, configured, tuned Development and Test Lab SW HW resources

Worked and coordinated offshore developers at several offshore development locations

Project Leadership at UNIX/AIX SW Products and Server HW Lab for Java System Test

Java Platforms, LINUX, UNIX/AIX, Windows Operating Systems, N-Tier Web Products Test using utilities, simulators, benchmark applications, CLI, PERL, REXX, Bash, and Automated/Manual Tests

Confidential, Austin, TX

Senior SW Java Engineer QA SW/HW Consultant

Responsibilities:

Delivery of major IBM SW and HW Products releases. Mentored and Managed SW Developers, Contractors, and Interns.

Managed installed, configured, tuned Development and Test Lab SW HW resources

Worked and coordinated offshore developers at several offshore development locations

Project Leadership at UNIX/AIX SW Products and Server HW Lab for Java System Test

Java Platforms, LINUX, UNIX/AIX, Windows Operating Systems, N-Tier Web Products Test using utilities, simulators, benchmark applications, CLI, PERL, REXX, Bash, and Automated/Manual Tests

Confidential, Austin, Texas

Member of the Board of Directors

Responsibilities:

Taking the Confidential of Texas, a 501c(3) small non-profit to the largest hunger-relief charity in Central Texas

Created programs providing food and grocery products, nutrition education and social services outreach to large number of clients each year through a network of large number of Partner Agencies.

Overviewed the Executive Director, Food Bank Staff, my role that included responsibility for corporate donations, general fundraising, program development and delivery, budget and team management, public speaking, and relationship management.

Confidential, Austin, TX

Advisory Software Engineer

Responsibilities:
